ing: 1 (6 ounce) tub vanilla-flavored yogurt (such as YoplaitÂ®)
des: "Lived in Israel for a few years and lived on Re:Bar's shakes, now that I'm back in America I can't get them. This tastes almost exactly the same as their Re:Vive shake does. It's my favorite one! For a thicker shake freeze your yogurt before blending."
ins: Blend yogurt, peach slices, orange juice, almonds, and granola in a blender until smooth.
